input.sentences: he was excited the minute he saw the snowfall on his home .
so many things were buried in the powdery ice .
the sunrise cast a beautiful shadow on all of it through the big tree out front .
the sheep even seemed a little excited about the weather change .
the photographer bundled up and went on his way to take advantage of the beautiful winter day .
output.sentences: The snow rested so gently on the rooftops and trees.
It even buried the front yards too.
Sunsets on the trees feature gorgeous while blankets of snow.
The sheep were excited about it too!
Many came out to take pictures of the wonderful winter day.
